import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import AddCard from 'client/components/AddCard' function index() { const [teams, setTeams] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost/wp-json/custom/teams') .then(resf => resf.json()) .then(data => setTeams(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) return () => { // cleanup } }, []) console.log('teams=') console.log(teams) const teamlist = teams.map(team =>

Team name: {team.team_name}

Home court: {team.team_stadium}

Location: {team.team_state}

) console.log(teamlist) return (
{teamlist}
) } export default index
